subject: DEAREST BELOVED IN CHRIST
body:
DEAREST BELOVED IN CHRIST
RE: LOAN APPLICATION AMOUNT OF US$70,000.00 IN YOUR FAVOR
Greetings in the name of the lord almighty and our lord Jesus Christ.
I acknowledge the receipt of your email and the contents were fully understood.
IN RESPECT TO THE LOAN AMOUNT OF US$70,000.00
We would need your personal data Which would enable us process your loan Which would be Transferred to you as soon as possible! The transfer of the loan must be a bank to bank transfer, except otherwise stated by the borrower Which means, you will have to Provide the means for Which you want your loan transfer to you.
Usually to start up the loan process, We would like to Inform you That getting the loan in your country, will be easy as long as you have a job at hand and you are well above 18 years, and with a proof of identity.
The services of JESUS IN HIS mightiness GLOBAL MINISTRY CHURCH. are rendered all over the world. All you need to do is 'comply with our rules and Regulations and Provide us with your correct details and contact address to be able to Process the loan in your favor, so far so good we have had most of people paid us back our money in the due time while some have given us incorrect and fake identities, with the intention of going with our money. May God forgive Those who plan to run away with JESUS IN HIS CHURCH MINISTRY mightiness GLOBAL MONEY!
But we assure you That once your details are well given, we would offer you the Loan you want within (2) days of processing the Loan.
Therefore, you will have to provide the following details:
NAME:.................................
AGE:.................................
SEX:.................................
MARITAL STATUS:.................................
CONTACT PHONE NUMBER:.................................
ADDRESS:.................................
CITY:.................................
STATE:.................................
COUNTRY:.................................
ZIP CODE:.................................
OCCUPATION:.................................
MONTHLY INCOME:.................................
AMOUNT NEEDED:.................................
FULL BANK DETAILS:.................................
WHEN NEEDED:.................................
PURPOSE OF LOAN:.................................
REPAYMENT DURATION:.................................
WE AWAIT YOUR SWIFT REPLY TO THIS E-MAIL.
MAY THE GRACE OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST, THE LOVE OF GOD, AND THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE HOLY SPIRIT BE WITH YOU AND THE REST OF YOUR FAMILY.
STAY BLESSED.
REV. FLORENCE MATHEW.

subject: Re:   DEAREST BELOVED IN CHRIST
body:
Dear Rev. Florence Mathew,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity to apply for a loan through Jesus In His Mightiness Global Ministry Church. I appreciate your willingness to assist me financially.

However, before proceeding, I would like to know more about the terms and conditions of this loan. Specifically, I am interested in understanding the interest rate, repayment period, and any additional fees that may be associated with this loan.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joe
